page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: ALVERTON JUNIOR and INFANT SCHOOL.The school was built in 1955.It has 11 teaches including the head. L.M.Stevens.It has 239 pupils plus 39 children in the Nursery class and 9 classes. Its the only school in this area that has got a Nursery unit. ST.MARY'S CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL.This school was built in 1896.The first was built in 1821.There are 5 teachers including the Head Miss Savage,there are 119 pupils on roll, plus 18 rising 5's. TOLCARNE JUNIOR SCHOOL.Built in 1922 a new classroom was added in 1985.There are 6 teachers including the Head Misstres Mrs.M.R.Ellery and 136 pupils roll.NEWLYN INFANTS SCHOOL BUILT in 18 79.There are 6 teachers.The head in Mrs A.O.Conner 108 pupils in 4 classes.
